column2:
"Wow, this is observational data of the flight of butterflies! <%me>,
I don't know how to thank you...!"

"This is more than enough data for analyzing
the mechanism behind those butterfly swarms."

"But wow, what a breathtaking sight that must
have been! If only I could witness it firsthand, I'd--"

"No, I mustn't say that. I'm an ARKS meteorologist,
not an operative. I must focus on what I can do, not
what I can't. Thank you for all your help."
